15522222222222121.content: You are falling down in darkness. You don't remember anything, you just know that you're falling down in the pitch black. After a long fall, you hit the ground, hard. You close your eyes and faint. After hours of sleeping, you finally wake up. You slowly open your eyes and feel you're no longer on the cold ground, but on a soft surface. You have the worst headache you ever had. Painfully, you stand up and notice that the surface you're one is an immense bed, black and green in colour. You look around the room confused and find out that everything is huge. You see shelves full of books and paintings of musical notes all around the room. You then hear someone humming as the door of the room opens. A huge creature flies in; she has green long hair, a black dress, slim legs with toeless feet. She has blue eyes and a green belt. You notice she has also long arms with fingerless hands and two plump breasts. You blush looking at that section of her body as you recognize the creature: it's Meloetta! She finally reaches the bed and notices you "Oh, glad to see you awake little guy" she says in a singsong voice, while smiling warmly at you "Who are you? And where am I?" you ask "Oh, right, my name's Meloetta, glad to meet you. And, I found you in front of my house, on a rough shape. So I brought you here, and I healed your wounds" she says "T-Thank you" you say "You're welcome. Do you need anything?" Meloetta then asks "Well, I'd like a glass of water if..." you say, but she cuts you off "Coming!" she says giggling, while exiting the room. She returns shortly after, with a bottle cap filled with warm. She hands you the cap "Her you go little guy" she says "Thanks" you say. You drink slowly while Meloetta watches you all the time. You then put the cap down as Meloetta carefully picks you up "Do you feel better?" she asks "Yeah, thank you for everything" you say "Don't even think about it. That's nothing for friends" she replies smiling "You're so kind" you say, making her smile and blush "Thanks!" she says picking you in a soft hug, careful to not hurt you. She then looks at you "Come on little one, how about I give you a tour of the house?" she asks "I'd like that.." you say as she gets up.
15522222222222121.title: A new world

155222222222221222211.content:
You can't say what happened. You are falling in a dark well that seems to have no end. You think you are in some kind of very realistic dream. Too bad it isn't. But you are wrong, this well has got an end. And you hit it pretty hard. The last thing you hear before blacking out is an amused "Oh?". Then you fall into deep sleep.

You open your eyes, a sharp headache makes you grit your teeth in pain. But something catches your attention. You notice you are on a soft and warm surface, something as well soft and warm covering all your body but your head. Almost like a blanket... Moving to sitting position, you notice that you are actually on a bed, but something's wrong... this bed is huge! You look around, you see you are in a gigantic room, colored with different shades of blue. A small breeze passes through an open window adorned with azure curtains. Suddenly a door opens and a blue, huge creature floats in. It is about 140 ft tall, it has short legs, a small, slim and furry body. Two tails, each with a red gem on it, float behind it. It has long arms, two plump breasts on its chest, making you assume its female. Her head is star shaped, a red gem is on her forehead. Two golden eyes look across the room, and specifically to you. Scared, you cower under the blankets, but two blue fingers pull them away and gently pick you up. You stare into those two golden eyes, not finding anything to say. So the creature speaks first "How are you feeling?" she asks "I-I'm f-fine" you say. But you forgot your headache, which reminds you its presence. You grunt in pain "You shouldn't lie" she says "I'm trying to help you". You just seem to notice the various bandages covering parts of your body "Who are you? Where am I?" you ask "Oh right. My name is Azelf, I'm the being of willpower. And you're in my house. I found you outside, badly bruised, so I decided to bring you here to heal you up" she speaks in a calm voice "Now, tell me your name and where you come from". You only remember your name, you tell her, but you can't remember anything else. The sharp pain in your head acts up again, and if that isn't enough, minor pains in other parts of your body make their presence noticeable. You try to resist, but the pain is too much. Clearly this body is still tired "Don't struggle little one, you should rest some more" Azelf says, putting you back under the blanket and pulling it up to your neck. She then starts caressing your head gently. You try hard to not fall asleep, you don't want to let your guard down. But you are too tired and give up, falling asleep once again. Azelf smiles a little and lies down next to you.
155222222222221222211.title: Azelf, the willpower goddess

1552222222222212222111.content: You rest for about two hours. You wake up and open your eyes. Looking around, you notice you are still in the blue colored room. So this wasn't a dream. You are still in the same blue bed you fell asleep in earlier "Azelf?" you call out. No reply. Turning your head, you see the willpower pokemon napping next to you "Azelf?" you call again, a little louder this time. The blue pokemon opens her eyes and looks in your direction "Oh, you're awake. How are you feeling?" she asks. You notice that your throat is practically dry "I'm very thirsty. Can I have a drink?" "Sure, wait for me" Azelf says, lifting herself from the bed and flying out of the room. She returns shortly after, with a small glass of water "Here you go" she holds it out for you. You try to move to a sitting position, but a sharp pain keeps you from doing so. You whelp and lay back down "Seems your wounds aren't fully healed yet. It's better for you to stay in bed for now" she says, nearing the glass to your lips. She tilts it slowly so you can drink without choking. After drinking the whole glass, Azelf places it on a nightstand and sits next to you "Do you feel better?" she asks, getting a nod from you. Giving a smile, the willpower pokemon lies on her belly in front of you "Now, can you tell me how did you got here? You're clearly not from this world" she says. You nod "In fact, I'm not. I remember I was walking in the forest when I blacked out and woke up here, shrunk" you say. Azelf seems to be thinking "A portal" she says "You obviously got pulled in a portal that make you pass through space and time, making you end up here". You really don't know much about these type of things, so you can do nothing but nod "Do you know how can I return home?" you ask hopeful. Unluckily, Azelf shakes her head "I'm sorry, I don't. I'm not the one that can help you" she says, truly sorry for you. You lower your head, sad. Sad that you probably won't see your parents anymore. Sad that you won't return home. Sad that you're forced to live in a world you don't even know. Azelf seems to read your mind and smiles sadly "If it makes you feel better, you can stay with me as much as you want. I'll take good care of you. If you don't want to... I insist that you are fully healed before leaving" she says. You think to this. You're alone in an unknown world, you have nowhere to go, but above all, Azelf is the only one that offered you to stay with her. Maybe other pokemon wouldn't have been so kind. So you decide "If it's not a problem... may I stay?" you ask. Azelf's golden eyes seem to shine at this; a huge smiles appears on her face as she picks you from under the covers and hugs you full force. You would have enjoyed this, if your wounds were gone. Too bad they're not "Ouch!" you yell. Azelf immediately softens her grip "Sorry. However the answer is yes, you can stay all you want. It's not a problem for me. I actually wanted someone to keep me company, I'm all by myself in this house. Well, not anymore I guess" she says smiling. You smile back as she puts you back under the blanket "Well, it's just 5 PM, would you like to do something? Maybe play a game. Or we could get to know to each other better" she says "What do you want to do?"
1552222222222212222111.title: Waking up later

155222222222222112.content:
Time passes. How much time is uncertain, but when you finally begin to come to your surroundings make no sense. You appear to be in a tiny hospital bed - tiny because everything else around it is gargantuan as evidenced by the easily five foot tall bedside lamp beside it. A cloth serves as your gown, incredibly soft and...clingy to the slightest bit of static electricity. Your clothes are laid in a pile next to the bed, albeit slightly singed. Near the bed you were in and the lamp was what appeared to be a picture, but it was turned away from you so you couldn't see what was on it.

Shortly, you can hear voices in the other room - all...feminine. "Winny, I told you why he's with me. I found him out there in rough shape, so I should be the one to at least get him back on his feet!"

"Right. Are you even certain this is a human male? I distinctly remember a Machop being very upset when you confused her for one. And for the last time, stop calling me that!" another voice says.

"Oh come on, that was funny! Especially when she threw her halfway to the next town even staying at that size!" a third voice chuckles, and then adds after a moment's silence, "Er, anyway...the clothes I washed weren't of any brand I've heard of."

"You totally burnt them, didn't you?"

"...Yes. I was trying not to, but then Jess zapped me in the butt!"

There was a sigh, and then the first voice announces, "Whatever, Cindy. Come on, I'm going to go check on our guest."

You freeze, and attempt to hide under the covers. However, it's in vain as a huge set of slender pink fingers gently pulls the covers away and their owner says happily, "See? Human. And he's awake!"

Understanding that you need to get this over with, you look up towards the source of the voice. You're partly familiar with Pokemon, so you recognize the three as Eeveelutions - a Glaceon, Flareon, and Sylveon respectfully. Only, they're very human-like in their body shape complete with very prominent breasts. The Glaceon grumbles slightly while the Flareon gently waves hello with a smile. They're also absolutely gigantic, at least 70 feet easily. "Hm, seems he's scared of us..." the Sylveon says thoughtfully.

"Might be because, oh I don't know, we're each several times bigger than him? Why don't you go down to his size to calm him down?" the Glaceon counters as she absentmindedly messes with her blue hair. Wait - down to your size? What does that even mean?

Your question is answered as the Sylveon begins to shrink in size. Previously she was the tallest of the three. Eventually, she stops at about 6'1" and says, "This is as small as I go, guy, so I hope you're not so scared now." she then looks back at the other two and says, "And as for you two, don't get any funny ideas. Ice in my ear this morning was bad enough, and Jess still owes me a new sex toy after she broke my last one!"

"S-sex toy?" you manage, fearful that these anthropomorphic Pokemon creatures use humans for such a purpose and treat them basically like easily replaceable objects.

"Hey! He does speak!" the Flareon says.

"Uh, yeah. Sex toy. O-oh. Oh... No no! We're not like that at all! Um, maybe I should introduce us here. My name is Katie. The Flareon is Cindy, whom I swear if she were any more laid back she'd be a Slakoth... And the other is Winny. She's a cold, calculating mistress who buries her head under an avalanche of books." Katie says after realizing what you were thinking.

"Okay, first off I'm not always that cold. Second, it's Winter, not Winny! Don't poison the man's mind with incorrect information, baby sis!" Winter snaps back. ...Did you hear right? Baby sister?!

Katie rolled her bright blue eyes and answered your inevitable question. "Yeah, I'm the youngest of my sisters. The only reason Winter is acting the way she is is because she's the second oldest."

Now that you can take a better view of Katie, you can see she's dressed very fashionably...if not a bit provocatively. As far as you can tell, Cindy is wearing even more revealing clothing, not that you mind. Winter is the only one not trying to show off much, but her T-shirt and pants still hug her every curve tightly. You attempt to get up, but you're met with terrible pain. Winter responds by gently pushing you back into the bed, her touch very cool and soothing. "Whoa, don't push yourself so hard, human! You're perfectly safe here." she reassures.

"Yeah, you were in pretty rough shape when I found you. I'm not gonna force you to stay, but I don't think you've much choice until you heal up." Katie confirms.

"So...how'd you find your way here? Winny here was all like, 'humans don't exist, at least not anymore, and males are like the stuff of legends' and then you pop up." Cindy asks very casually.

"Don't you start, too..." Winter growled.
155222222222222112.title: Anthro

15522222222222221111.content:
Near the edge of a forest the portal opens up, carelessly tossing your unconscious body into a new world. You bounce and skid along the dusty road only to slide to a stop face first, causing scrapes along your body. Despite this you just lie there in the middle of the road. Nearby, a loppuny was returning from her morning walk through the woods. As she was bouncing along, she noticed something strange lying in her way. Curious, she moved carefully towards it unsure if it were dangerous or not. As she moved forward, she quickly realized what you were. “A human!” the loppuny thought to herself. “Poor little thing, its hurt. I should bring it home.” Gingerly scooping up you, she holds you to her like a baby. Bouncing on her long legs she quickly bounds back to her home. You briefly gain enough consciousness to barely sense your warm and furry surroundings before fading back into the darkness.

You later wake up alone in a large warm bed. A huge bed to be precise, large enough to hold someone around 20 feet tall. To your surprise and slight embarrassment, you find that that you're in your underwear. You also see that you have quite a few bandages. That’s probably why you’re in your undies. You look around the room trying to get a feel of who lives here, and more importantly where has your clothes gone off too. On a nightstand nearby you see a photograph. In it are four lopunny anthros smiling and posing to the camera, probably the owners of the house. The eldest looked twenty at most while the younger two looked about sixteen. The middle one looked around 18 or so. The younger two looked like they were shiny Pokémon, and you could tell they were definitely twins. Even if they didn’t own the house you could tell, they're huge compared to you. You get up and were about to wander the house when you heard someone talking from downstairs. "Yeah, I found it lying on the ground. It was knocked out so I brought them here," said a voice. "Bullshit, humans are just fairy tales", "Can I see it?", "I hope they’re okay..." said three others. You start panicking, unsure of your next move. You decide that you should stay still and pretend you're still asleep and think of a better plan later, just as they made their way up to the room. "I think they’re still asleep so," the second eldest said. "C’MON I WANNA SEE IT!” the youngest cried out only to be silenced by the other three. "Shhh!"

You lie down on your side with your back to the door, curled up slightly. You kept your eyes shut and tried to lie perfectly still with the hope that they'll leave you alone. They didn't of course. "Right here on my bed. I told ya" Violet said softly, trying not to wake you. "Guess you were right for once" Jasmine, the eldest, said with a teasing laugh. You started to panic as you heard someone sat on the bed. “Why can’t they just leave?” you thought. All you wanted to do was go back home and pretend like this never happened, to just pretend this was all just a dream if not a very lucid dream. Your thoughts are interrupted by a large hand gently stroking your hair. “Rise and shine, little one. Rise and shine.” Violet spoke softly while gently pushing on your shoulder in an effort to rouse you from your sleep. Do you “wake up”?
15522222222222221111.title: Lopunny

choices: ...stay with these girls. They seem friendly enough.
...leave and explore on your own. You need to get home!
155222222222222211111.content:
Although you're terrified of seeing these creatures face to face, you decide that you were going to have to get this over with soon enough. Steeling your nerves, you finally rise until you're upright, and slowly turn to face the Lopunny's as the one closest to you, presumably Violet, backs up a bit, probably as a precaution, not knowing how you'd react and all. Finally, you take in the sight of the creatures that stood before you.

The one closest to you, whom you knew was named "Violet", looked visibly like a Lopunny... aside from the addition of very human, very feminine features. Most notably, a certain set of curves that Lopunny's didn't normally have, and even stranger still, she was HUGE... the bed may have fit someone 20 feet tall, but she was atleast 30. Either this wasn't her bed, or she could somehow...control her size? Shaking that thought out of your head, you finally realize why she was named Violet... the ordinarily white tufts of hair on her body all had lines, streaks of a pale shade of Violet. That made it easy to distinguish her from the rest, anyway.

The rest of them all had similar human and feminine features, and shared the same color-coding aspect with the eldest having yellowish, Jasmine-colored streaks going through hers. The littler ones, although having the brighter, pinker-colored tufts of fur that came with being shiny, had both red and blue patches of fur on them, respectively. You wonder if they always had them, or if they were specifically color coded in an effort to tell them apart...because aside from that, they were all very, very similar looking. The only way you could tell them apart otherwise was their curves, and MAYBE the length of things like arms and legs... and you didn't really want to take the time to figure that out, so this would simplify things at least.

You realize that you'd been staring for several seconds at this point, though, and that they'd been staring back as well. You consider saying something, but you feel pretty intimidated right now, so you stay silent, afraid to say anything. Violet, however, seems to catch on to this. "I think our size is scaring him, girls." "Aw, but I like looking at him from up here. He looks so cute like that." says one of the little ones, and Violet just groans. "I'm going to go down to his level to talk, and I hope you'll all do the same." You assume she's going to crouch down and get closer to you, which would scare you, but something else happens.

She begins to... reduce her size? Staring at her in awe, the purple-streaked Lopunny begins to get smaller and smaller before you, seeming less terrifyingly large by the second. As the base of the bed reaches knee-height, she climbs on, and continues to reduce in size before you, before ending up at a still tall, but less terrifying 8 feet tall. "Is this better, little guy?" she says, approaching you gently. "I...y-yeah..." you stutter out, burying yourself in the covers a little bit more. When she was gigantic, she was dauntingly huge, but now that you can see her at a more relatable size...she looked kinda cute. Which was a terrifying thought in and of itself, considering she wasn't even human. But glancing up at the other, giant Lopunny's, that looked down upon you in curiosity, they suddenly seemed a little less frighteningly. Perhaps you even liked them that large.

Violet clears her throat to get your attention, though, so you turn to face her, feeling a little less afraid. "Are you okay, now? When I found you out on the road, I didn't know what to do, so I took you here and treated you as best as I could. Do the bruises still hurt?" As she says that, you suddenly realize that you can still feel a gnawing pain from the bruises...but it was a subtle one. "No, not really. But, uh... my clothes?" "Oh! How silly of me. Jasmine, can you get his clothes? They're in the drawer over there." Jasmine simply nods, and you watch as she stomps towards the other end of the giant room. You still can't get over the size of them, and how apparently they could manipulate it. It would take some getting used to.

"So..." she says softly, sitting down next to you, "You gave me a bit of a shock, you know. Humans are legends. Nobody believes they exist anymore." You'd heard this bit come from the other room earlier, but her repeating it again surprised you. "I guess you showing up here proves them wrong, doesn't it?" "Oh, well... I don't think it does." you say, causing Violet to tilt your head. "Huh? What do you mean?" "YEAH, WHAT DO YOU MEAN?!" says (or practically yells) one of the younger ones, forcing you to cover your ears. "Ruby! Indoor voice!" she scolds, and the red-colored one (whom you now know is named 'Ruby') whispers out a 'Sorry'. Shaking her head, Violet turns back to you. "Really, though, what do you mean?"

After getting dressed, you explain the mysterious portal, and how you're not really from this world. This seemed to shock the Lopunny's even more. "A portal?! That sounds crazy... but it has to be true. Otherwise you wouldn't be here. But that doesn't really explain-" DING DONG rang a powerful doorbell suddenly, stealing everyone's attention. "I'll get it." says one of the younger ones, running out of the room. "No, I'll get it!" says the other, chasing after her. Jasmine simply sighs, and looks towards you before walking out of the room. This gives you a moment alone with Violet.

"Well, what matters if that you're here now...so what do you want to do? Do you want to hang out with us? You're free to go, of course, but...the other Pokemon may not be so kind." "How...so?" you ask cautiously. "Well, again, humans are legends...who knows what they'll do if they find you. What I'm saying is... they might not be as hospitable we've been." "Are you saying that I'm in danger?!" The Lopunny just laughs as you say that. "Oh, don't be silly! They wouldn't hurt you! It's just that, well..." she says, trailing off. "Well? Well what?" you ask, still concerned but also curious. "...well, you maaaaaaaaay be the only male around. I don't know if you noticed, but our kind is...female based, if you know what I mean." You blinked. "You...can't be serious." "I'm completely serious when I say that any woman would be overjoyed to find someone that isn't a woman, and a human at that. They might leap at the opportunity to...get...busy...with you."

This is ridiculous. In this strange land of weird Pokemon women, you're the only male...peachy. That'll certainly help you in your efforts to get home, being tailed by a bunch of giant pokemon that can grow at will, that all really, really want you. No, staying with these friendly Lopunny's seemed like the safe option...but if you do that, who knows if you'll be able to get home. They may volunteer to help if you ask, but they'll likely not go cross-country searching for answers. If the solution isn't immediately around you, you'll be stuck here forever. And maybe the other Pokemon would be more willing to help you, seeing as how you're a "fairy tale" and all. Who wouldn't leap at the chance to help a leprechaun if it approached you? But at the same time, seeing as how you're the only guy... who knows what they'd do to you.

After some thought, you decide to...
155222222222222211111.title: Yes

15522222222222221112.title: Perhaps Eevee?

Flying-types can let you ride on their backs as they fly and that's just bad-ass.

So, what will it be?

info.brief_description: A world filled with Morphic female and male pokemon who can change their size
info.description:
you are the main character in a world filled with anthromorphic pokemon, they can all change their size from regular human size to god.
time to round up the rules so far.

No.1: all the characters (except your own) have to be a pokemon

No.2: you (the main character) cannot die.

No.3: No inflation, scat/watersports or killing via stomping or eating.

No.4 the minimum age for the characters is 16+.

No.5 the pokemon don't have to be constantly macro, they can be regular sized

No.6 growths cannot be instant and anything can be used as a sex toy.

No.7 you can also shrink instead of the pokemon growing

No.8 the other characters also cannot die

so have fun with the story and just follow the rules when adding.
